kashmir.name: The Nomads Quest (Nirvana)
kashmir.description: An immersive journey through the breathtaking valleys, lakes, and mountains of Kashmir, exploring the best of nature and culture.
kashmir.detailedDescription: Embark on an unforgettable 9-day adventure through Srinagar, Gurez, Gulmarg, Pahalgam, and Sonmarg, experiencing stunning landscapes, ancient temples, and thrilling excursions.

itinerary.title: Arrival at Srinagar
itinerary.description: Arrive at Srinagar Airport, meet our driver, and explore the famous Mughal Gardens and Shankaracharya Temple. Overnight stay at a hotel in Srinagar.

itinerary.title: Srinagar to Gurez
itinerary.description: Travel to the enchanting Gurez Valley via Razdan Pass, visiting Wullar Lake en route. Arrive in Dawar by evening, enjoy views of Habba Khatoon Peak, and stay overnight at a hotel.

itinerary.title: Tulail Valley Excursion
itinerary.description: Explore the breathtaking Tulail Valley, passing through picturesque villages along the Kishanganga River. Visit Habba Khatoon Peak in the evening and return to your hotel.

itinerary.title: Return to Srinagar
itinerary.description: Travel back to Srinagar, explore the local markets, and relax at your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Gulmarg Day Excursion
itinerary.description: Visit the stunning Gulmarg, ride the world-famous Gondola to Affarwat Peak, and enjoy panoramic views. Return to Srinagar for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Gulmarg to Pahalgam
itinerary.description: Drive to the beautiful valley of Pahalgam. Explore the local market and take a pony ride to Baisaran, also known as 'Mini Switzerland.' Overnight stay in Pahalgam.

itinerary.title: Aru & Betaab Valley Excursion
itinerary.description: Visit Aru and Betaab Valley, famous for their scenic meadows, lakes, and mountains. Enjoy breathtaking views and return to Srinagar for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Day Excursion to Sonmarg
itinerary.description: Head to Sonmarg, known as the 'Meadow of Gold.' Enjoy pony rides and explore Zero Point, which lies between Kashmir and Ladakh. Return to Srinagar for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to Srinagar Airport for your onward journey, carrying unforgettable memories of Kashmir.

inclusions: Meal plan on MAP basis (Breakfast & Dinner).
Welcome drink on arrival at hotels/houseboat.
All transfers and sightseeing by AC/Non-AC cab.
All applicable taxes, parking charges, and driver wages.
1-hour private Shikara ride on Dal Lake.
exclusions: Entrance fees for gardens and monuments.
Lunch, drinks, coffee, tea, and tips.

kashmir.name: Green Escape
kashmir.description: Discover the breathtaking beauty of Kashmir with an unforgettable escape into its valleys and lakes.
kashmir.detailedDescription: Enjoy a peaceful yet thrilling getaway in the heart of Kashmir, exploring its serene lakes, lush meadows, and snow-capped mountains.

itinerary.title: Arrival at Srinagar
itinerary.description: Arrive at Srinagar and settle into your accommodation, preparing for the upcoming adventure.

itinerary.title: Gulmarg Day Excursion
itinerary.description: Explore the beauty of Gulmarg, take a Gondola ride, and immerse yourself in the scenic landscapes.

itinerary.title: Srinagar to Pahalgam
itinerary.description: Drive to Pahalgam, enjoy the valley's lush green beauty, and explore its charming surroundings.

itinerary.title: Aru, Betaab Valley & Chandanwari
itinerary.description: Visit the picturesque Aru Valley, the stunning Betaab Valley, and Chandanwari for an enchanting experience.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Bid farewell to Kashmir and depart with unforgettable memories.

inclusions: Welcome drink on arrival in hotels/houseboat.
Local cab for Aru, Betaab Valley & Chandanwari.
All transfers and sightseeing by AC/Non-AC cab.
All applicable taxes and charges, parking charges, drivers wages.
exclusions: Entrance fees of Gardens and Monuments.
Horse Ride/Cab to Zojila & Zero Point.

kashmir.name: Honeymoon Special
kashmir.description: Perfect for couples looking for a scenic retreat.
kashmir.detailedDescription: A romantic journey through Kashmir‚Äôs most beautiful landscapes, perfect for couples seeking peace and serenity.

itinerary.title: Arrival at Srinagar & Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Arrive at Srinagar Airport, meet our driver, and check-in. Visit the famous Mughal Gardens, Shankaracharya Temple followed by a Shikara Ride in the evening. Try local cuisines at nearby restaurants. Return to the hotel for dinner & overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Srinagar Local Excursion
itinerary.description: After breakfast, leave for Sonmarg - the Meadow of Gold. Spend the day exploring its green meadows and majestic mountains. Enjoy a pony ride to Thajiwas Glacier. Return to Srinagar for overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Srinagar to Gulmarg
itinerary.description: Post breakfast, drive to Gulmarg. Enjoy the Gondola ride, Asia‚Äôs Highest Cable Car, among lush green forests covered with snow. Visit Affarwat Peak at 13,500 ft. above sea level for breathtaking views. Overnight stay in Gulmarg.

itinerary.title: Gulmarg to Pahalgam
itinerary.description: After breakfast, proceed to Pahalgam - the Valley of Shepherds. Check-in to the hotel, explore the local market, and take a pony ride to Baisaran for stunning views. Enjoy a warm dinner at the hotel. Overnight stay in Pahalgam.

itinerary.title: Aru & Betaab Valley
itinerary.description: After breakfast, leave for a day excursion to Aru Valley & Betaab Valley. Enjoy the scenic meadows, lakes, and mountains. Explore the base camp for trekking to Kolhai Glacier and Tarsar Lake. Betaab Valley lies en route to Amarnath Temple. Overnight stay in a houseboat.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Enjoy a leisurely breakfast and transfer to Srinagar Airport for departure with beautiful memories.

inclusions: Welcome drink on arrival in hotels/houseboat.
Local cab for Aru, Betaab Valley & Chandanwari.
All transfers and sightseeing by AC/Non-AC cab.
All applicable taxes and charges, parking fees, driver wages.
1-hour private Shikara ride at Dal Lake.
exclusions: Entrance fees for gardens and monuments.
Lunch, drinks, coffee, tea, and tips.

kashmir.name: Winter Twilight Kashmir
kashmir.description: Explore Kashmir in winter with snow-covered beauty.
kashmir.detailedDescription: Discover the charm of Kashmir in the winter months, when it is covered in pristine snow and offers winter sports like skiing.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Srinagar & Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Arrive at Srinagar Airport, transfer to the hotel, and check-in. Visit Mughal Gardens, Shankaracharya Temple, and take a Shikara ride on Dal Lake.

itinerary.title: Gulmarg Adventure
itinerary.description: Drive to Gulmarg, enjoy the Gondola ride, skiing, and snow activities at Affarwat Peak. Overnight stay in Gulmarg.

itinerary.title: Pahalgam - The Valley of Shepherds
itinerary.description: Travel to Pahalgam via Saffron Fields & Apple Valley. Explore the local market, take a pony ride to Baisaran, and enjoy breathtaking landscapes.

itinerary.title: Aru, Betaab Valley & Chandanwari
itinerary.description: Visit Aru Valley, Betaab Valley, and Chandanwari for mesmerizing views and snow-filled adventures.

itinerary.title: Doodhpathri - The Valley of Milk
itinerary.description: Explore Doodhpathri, a hidden gem with lush green meadows and scenic beauty. Return to Srinagar for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Departure from Srinagar
itinerary.description: Enjoy a leisurely breakfast and transfer to Srinagar Airport for departure with beautiful memories.

inclusions: Welcome drink on arrival at hotels/houseboat.
Local cab for Aru, Betaab Valley & Chandanwari.
All transfers and sightseeing by AC/Non-AC cab.
All applicable taxes and charges, parking fees, driver wages.
exclusions: Entrance fees for gardens and monuments.
Lunch, drinks, coffee, tea, and tips.
Horse ride/cab to Zojila & Zero Point.

kashmir.name: Thrill Trek Escape
kashmir.description: Discover the rich traditions and culture of Kashmir.
kashmir.detailedDescription: A cultural tour through Kashmir to experience its vibrant history, traditional art, and craftsmanship.

itinerary.title: Srinagar to Sonamarg
itinerary.description: Altitude: 7800 ft | Time Taken: 3 Hrs Drive. The trek begins at Shitkadi, a few kilometers ahead of Sonamarg. Pickup at 2.30 pm from Srinagar. Drive to the base camp takes around 2 hours. Night halt at Sonamarg.

itinerary.title: Sonamarg to Nachnai
itinerary.description: Altitude: 7800 ft to 11,500 ft | Time Taken: 6 hours, 11.6 km. The trek ascends gradually to the tabletop point. Continue hiking past the lunch point, reaching Nachnai campsite by late afternoon.

itinerary.title: Nachnai to Vishnusar
itinerary.description: Altitude: 11,500 ft to 12,000 ft | Time Taken: 6 hours, 13.5 km. A gradual ascent to Nichnai Pass (12,000 ft) followed by a descent to the lunch point. A normal walk through meadows leads to Vishnusar Lake campsite.

itinerary.title: Vishnusar Lake to Gadsar
itinerary.description: Altitude: 12,000 ft to 12,500 ft | Time Taken: 5 hours, 16 km. Trek passes through Kishansar Lake and ascends to Gadsar Pass (13,800 ft). Beautiful flower-laden meadows lead to Gadsar Lake and campsite.

itinerary.title: Gadsar to Satsar
itinerary.description: Altitude: 12,500 ft to 12,000 ft | Time Taken: 6 hours, 11.5 km. Cross a river and ascend to a high point offering views of Nanga Parbat. A gradual descent leads to the Satsar campsite near the famous seven lakes.

itinerary.title: Satsar to Gangabal Twin Lakes
itinerary.description: Altitude: 12,000 ft to 11,500 ft | Time Taken: 6 hours, 9 km. The trail includes a boulder zone and an ascent to the second-highest pass (12,900 ft). Views of four lakes before descending to Nandkul Lake campsite.

itinerary.title: Buffer Day
itinerary.description: A rest day at Gangabal Lake. Enjoy optional activities like exploration and relaxation in the beautiful surroundings.

itinerary.title: Gangabal to Naranag
itinerary.description: Altitude: 11,500 ft to 7,450 ft | Time Taken: 6 hours, 13 km. A steep descent leads to Naranag. Option to stay at Sonmarg or Srinagar, depending on departure.

inclusions: All accommodation during the trek on a sharing basis in tents.
Tents, sleeping bags, and all other camping gear.
Safety equipment (med kit, oxygen cylinders, oximeter, etc.).
Cooks, helpers, guides, porters, and mules.
Trekking permits and forest camping fees.

jammu.name: Jammu Spiritual Journey
jammu.description: Explore the divine temples and spiritual sites of Jammu.
jammu.detailedDescription: Visit sacred temples, seek blessings, and immerse yourself in the spiritual aura of Jammu‚Äôs renowned religious sites.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Local Exploration
itinerary.description: Arrive in Jammu and visit Ranbireshwar Temple and Raghunath Temple.

itinerary.title: Vaishno Devi Pilgrimage
itinerary.description: Begin the trek to the holy shrine of Mata Vaishno Devi.

itinerary.title: Shiv Khori Cave Temple
itinerary.description: Explore the mystical Shiv Khori cave temple.

itinerary.title: Akhnoor Fort & Bahu Fort
itinerary.description: Visit historic forts and enjoy the scenic views.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Explore local markets before heading home.

jammu.name: Jammu Nature Retreat
jammu.description: A relaxing getaway amidst Jammu‚Äôs natural beauty.
jammu.detailedDescription: Enjoy scenic views, serene lakes, and lush green meadows while experiencing the peaceful side of Jammu.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Patnitop Visit
itinerary.description: Arrive in Jammu and drive to Patnitop for a scenic retreat.

itinerary.title: Nathatop & Sanasar Lake
itinerary.description: Explore Nathatop‚Äôs stunning views and visit Sanasar Lake.

itinerary.title: Mansar & Surinsar Lakes
itinerary.description: Visit the beautiful twin lakes surrounded by forests.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Enjoy a morning nature walk before heading back.

jammu.name: Jammu Historic Tour
jammu.description: Discover the rich history and heritage of Jammu.
jammu.detailedDescription: Step back in time with visits to forts, palaces, and historical landmarks in Jammu.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Heritage Walk
itinerary.description: Arrive in Jammu and explore its historic streets and temples.

itinerary.title: Bahu Fort & Amar Mahal
itinerary.description: Visit Bahu Fort, Bagh-e-Bahu Garden, and Amar Mahal Palace.

itinerary.title: Mubarak Mandi Palace
itinerary.description: Explore the stunning architecture of Mubarak Mandi Palace.

itinerary.title: Siar Baba Waterfall & Temple Visit
itinerary.description: Relax near the Siar Baba Waterfall and visit a nearby temple.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: A relaxed morning before heading back home.

jammu.name: Jammu Wildlife Expedition
jammu.description: A thrilling wildlife exploration in Jammu‚Äôs forests.
jammu.detailedDescription: Visit some of the best wildlife sanctuaries and national parks in Jammu to witness exotic flora and fauna.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Jasrota Wildlife Sanctuary
itinerary.description: Arrive in Jammu and visit Jasrota Wildlife Sanctuary.

itinerary.title: Mansar Lake & Bird Watching
itinerary.description: Explore the beautiful Mansar Lake and spot migratory birds.

itinerary.title: Nandini Wildlife Sanctuary
itinerary.description: A jungle safari in Nandini Wildlife Sanctuary.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Enjoy a final morning nature walk before leaving.

jammu.name: Jammu Adventure Escapade
jammu.description: Experience the thrill of adventure sports in Jammu.
jammu.detailedDescription: An action-packed trip with trekking, paragliding, and river rafting in Jammu‚Äôs most exciting locations.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Adventure Briefing
itinerary.description: Arrive in Jammu and prepare for an adventure-filled trip.

itinerary.title: Trekking in Sanasar
itinerary.description: Trek through the scenic Sanasar hills.

itinerary.title: Paragliding at Nathatop
itinerary.description: Experience the thrill of flying over the hills of Nathatop.

itinerary.title: River Rafting in Chenab
itinerary.description: Enjoy a high-adrenaline rafting experience.

itinerary.title: Camping & Bonfire
itinerary.description: Relax with a night of camping and bonfire in Patnitop.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Head back home after an exhilarating trip.

ladakh.name: Ladakh Adventure Expedition
ladakh.description: An adrenaline-filled trip through the mountains of Ladakh.
ladakh.detailedDescription: Embark on an adventurous journey through Ladakh‚Äôs rugged terrain. Experience thrilling activities like trekking, mountain biking, and exploring remote regions.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Acclimatization
itinerary.description: Arrive in Leh, rest to adjust to high altitude, and explore the local market.

itinerary.title: Drive to Pangong Lake
itinerary.description: Travel to Pangong Lake, enjoy stunning views, and spend the night by the lake.

itinerary.title: Trek to Nubra Valley
itinerary.description: Begin your trek from Pangong to Nubra Valley, crossing beautiful landscapes.

itinerary.title: Explore Diskit & Hunder
itinerary.description: Visit Diskit Monastery, Hunder Sand Dunes, and enjoy a camel ride.

itinerary.title: Return to Leh
itinerary.description: Drive back to Leh, visit Magnetic Hill, Hall of Fame, and local attractions.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out from Leh and head back home with unforgettable memories.

ladakh.name: Ladakh Motorcycle Tour
ladakh.description: A thrilling ride through the rugged terrains of Ladakh.
ladakh.detailedDescription: Join a motorcycle tour through Ladakh‚Äôs stunning and challenging roads.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Bike Check
itinerary.description: Arrive in Leh, meet the group, and get your bikes ready.

itinerary.title: Ride to Pangong Lake
itinerary.description: Begin the thrilling ride to the breathtaking Pangong Lake.

itinerary.title: Ride to Nubra Valley
itinerary.description: Travel through Khardung La Pass and explore the sand dunes of Nubra.

itinerary.title: Visit Diskit Monastery & Return to Leh
itinerary.description: Explore Diskit Monastery, then ride back to Leh.

itinerary.title: Magnetic Hill & Hall of Fame
itinerary.description: Experience Magnetic Hill and visit the Hall of Fame Museum.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Final ride through Leh before departure.

ladakh.name: Leh-Ladakh Cultural Tour
ladakh.description: Immerse yourself in the rich heritage and traditions of Ladakh.
ladakh.detailedDescription: Explore Ladakh‚Äôs history, visit monasteries, and experience local culture.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Arrive in Leh and visit Shanti Stupa.

itinerary.title: Monastery Tour
itinerary.description: Explore Hemis Monastery and Thiksey Monastery.

itinerary.title: Leh Palace & Market
itinerary.description: Visit Leh Palace and shop at Leh Market.

itinerary.title: Stok Palace & Departure
itinerary.description: Explore Stok Palace and prepare for departure.

ladakh.name: Frozen River Trek
ladakh.description: Walk over the frozen Zanskar River on this unforgettable trek.
ladakh.detailedDescription: Trek through stunning icy landscapes and remote villages.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Acclimatization
itinerary.description: Arrive in Leh and prepare for the trek.

itinerary.title: Trek Begins
itinerary.description: Start your trek from Chilling over the frozen river.

itinerary.title: Trek to Lingshed
itinerary.description: Journey deeper into the icy landscape.

itinerary.title: Return Trek
itinerary.description: Retrace your steps and head back to Leh.

ladakh.name: Ladakh Scenic Retreat
ladakh.description: Enjoy a peaceful retreat in the breathtaking landscapes of Ladakh.
ladakh.detailedDescription: Unwind amidst breathtaking mountain views, lakes, and peaceful monasteries.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Relaxation
itinerary.description: Arrive in Leh and soak in the serene beauty.

itinerary.title: Pangong Lake Visit
itinerary.description: Relax by the lakeside and enjoy the scenic views.

itinerary.title: Nubra Valley Exploration
itinerary.description: Explore the valley and its peaceful landscapes.

itinerary.title: Return to Leh & Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Drive back to Leh and visit local attractions.
